alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Emanuel, northeastern Johnson and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Vidette to near New Home, and moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Wadley, Bartow, Summertown, Three Points, Moxley, Dellwood, Modoc, New Home, Blundale, and Colemans Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
